scripts.push:mmo: screeps-api download -d tmp && rm -f tmp/zeswarm* && yarn build --configMulti --output.dir tmp && screeps-api upload tmp/*.js
scripts.push:botarena: yarn build && yarn run push --server botarena
scripts.push:local: yarn build && yarn run push --server local
scripts.push:test: yarn build && yarn run push --server test
scripts.push:splus1: yarn build && yarn run push --server splus
scripts.push:splus2: yarn build && yarn run push --server splus2
scripts.push:atanner: yarn build && yarn run push --server atanner
scripts.push:all: yarn build && yarn run push --server test && yarn run push --server splus && yarn run push --server splus2 && yarn run push --server atanner
